decisions.description:
Decision to see if the record was created manually by user.
***Delete this and everything after this once you've updated for customer*** Depending on the customer's needs you'll find how and who will create leads within their system ideally they should be created via a List Import template or Web Form Submission. If users are manually creating leads find out what users and account for them within this decision logic. All of these currently will set every record to Created Rating = Lead 0 and set the user creating as the Record Owner & User Source ***End***
decisions.name: Created_manually_by_User_FIXME
decisions.label: Created manually by User? - FIXME

decisions.description: Checking if the Dead date is set or not.

decisions.label: Dead Date is Unknown

decisions.description: Checking if the owner changed or not.
decisions.name: Did_Owner_Change
decisions.label: Did Owner Change?

decisions.description:
Since our record is new this determines what sourcing strategy this record should be placed into.
***Delete this and everything after this once you've updated for customer*** You'll work with the customer to only include sourcing strategies that the customer uses. Per source work with customer to figure out field(s) and values should be used to result in proper sourcing strategy. Lastly, order the outcomes depending which strategy should fire first. ***END***

decisions.description:
Checking the conversion mechanisms to set appropriate Rating on the record if Rating is Unknown.
***Delete this and everything after this once you've updated for customer*** You'll need to work with the customer that determines if a record should be considered Stalled or Dead. Stalled means the prospect might buy at some point vs Dead means the prospect will never buy or they are bogus record. ***END***
decisions.name: New_Rating_FIXME

decisions.description:
In this decision checking on status and rating to figure out if velocity dates need to be filled in.
****

rules.name: Lead_3_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5))) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 3 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_2_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5))) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 2 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_1_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5))) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 1 - FIXME

rules.name: Lead_0_FIXME
rules.conditionLogic: (1 AND ((2 AND 3) OR (4 AND 5))) OR (1 AND 6 AND 7)
rules.label: Lead 0 - FIXME
